reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 458/22: OPTIONAL TAX ON VACANT RESIDENTIAL UNITS - DESIGNATED MUNICIPALITIES
reg_info.reg_name_text: OPTIONAL TAX ON VACANT RESIDENTIAL UNITS - DESIGNATED MUNICIPALITIES

content.content: 1. The following municipalities are designated for the purposes of Part IX.1 of the Act: 1. The City of Hamilton. 2. The City of Ottawa.
content.raw_html:
1. The following municipalities are designated for the purposes of Part IX.1 of the Act:

1. The City of Hamilton.

2. The City of Ottawa.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
